content: year  Allows up to 24-hour overlap period, where full capacity is active on both sites for transferring workload  Allows 12 swaps between sites per year (one direction) Each CBU test is limited to a maximum of 10 days Contracts and features  LIC is licensed to only one specific serial-numbered machine, and its transfer to another machine is not permitted  Offering requires TFP for software; CMP is grandfathered in.  The LIC license expires 5 years past WFM. An invalid LIC license resumes if the IBM Z machine is upgraded or replaced with an IBM Z machine that is not older than N-2.  Capacity Back Up Agreement  CBU capacity provided in annual increments  CBU tests provided in individual increments © Copyright IBM Corp. 2022. All rights reserved. 529 Appendix E. Frame configurations Power Distribution Units and Bulk Power Assembly-based systems This appendix describes the various frame configurations for Power Distribution Units (PDUs) and Bulk Power Assembly (BPA)-based systems.
